item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 10, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. An NFC movie library for my kids (472 points | 84 comments)
2. Radiology-specific foundation model (93 points | 31 comments)
3. Synthetic diamonds are now purer, more beautiful, and cheaper than mined (604 points | 346 comments)
4. Warner Brothers Cartoon Companion (19 points | discuss)
5. Windows NT vs. Unix: A design comparison (378 points | 299 comments)
6. Affordable DE10-Nano compatible boards for MiSTer FPGA retro platform (75 points | 15 comments)
7. Carpentopod: A Walking Table Project (144 points | 16 comments)
8. Sigrok – a portable, cross-platform, FOSS signal analysis software suite (84 points | 6 comments)
9. DOJ claims Google has "trifecta of monopolies" on Day 1 of ad tech trial (194 points | 121 comments)
10. 2016 was first year on record for zero roof fall fatalities in coal mining in US (6 points | 1 comment)
11. Project Hammer: reduce collusion in the Canadian grocery sector (283 points | 190 comments)
12. Sqlc: Compile SQL to type-safe code (123 points | 45 comments)
13. Just for Fun (2022) (209 points | 49 comments)
14. Launch HN: Deepsilicon (YC S24) – Software and hardware for ternary transformers (152 points | 56 comments)
15. iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max (481 points | 1205 comments)
16. Estimating Bidders' Valuation Distributions in Online Auctions (2005) [pdf] (12 points | discuss)
17. Cecilia Payne-Gaposchkin discovered that stars are mostly made of hydrogen (65 points | 14 comments)
18. Gdi.js: JavaScript Runtime Written in Object Pascal (33 points | 3 comments)
19. B-Trees and Database Indexes (203 points | 35 comments)
20. Transfusion: Predict the next token and diffuse images with one multimodal model (89 points | 5 comments)
21. Litecli: CLI for SQLite Databases with auto-completion and syntax highlighting (70 points | 7 comments)
22. Why GitHub won (454 points | 388 comments)
23. API Complexity Is a Lie (32 points | 21 comments)
24. Hacking misconfigured AWS S3 buckets: A complete guide (191 points | 37 comments)
25. Talaria: Interactively Optimizing Machine Learning Models for Efficient Inferenc (24 points | discuss)
26. Show HN: I mapped HN's favorite books with GPT-4o (236 points | 51 comments)
27. Every webpage deserves to be a place (89 points | 25 comments)
28. Japan gives $2.4B in incentives to Toyota and more for EV battery making (24 points | 12 comments)
29. FTC Pushed to Crack Down on Companies That Ruin Hardware via Software Updates (319 points | 129 comments)
30. PSA: Eget That Executable from GitHub (31 points | 14 comments)
